name: The Good, the Bad and the Horsey
name_original: The Good, the Bad and the Horsey
description:
Brittney hates her podunk, horse-crazy town almost as much as she hates horses themselves... but, with the town's traditional Silver Lasso Run only a month away, can she take this chance to finally grab the reins of her own destiny? Bounced between a good ol' Southern cowgal on the hunt for a dangerous criminal, a mysterious magical drifter with a dark secret, and a rogue centaur who lives by her own rules, Brittney is thrust into a fantastical alternate Wild West world... and has to choose between The Good, The Bad, and The Horsey!!

FEATURES

  • WLW!
  • Horses
  • 2+ love interests to choose from
  • Wild gunfights and thrilling races
  • More horses
  • Unique endings
  • Over 150,000 words!
  • Available for Windows, Mac & Linux 
  • Dyslexic-friendly font option
  • 18 original music tracks

The Good, the Bad and the Horsey is an original visual novel by Team Rumblebee.
